title: Association
description: Link new information to something you already know. Helps anchor new memories to existing ones.

title: Memory Palace
description: Visualize a familiar location and place items along a mental path to recall them spatially.

title: Story Method
description: Create a vivid and bizarre story that connects each item you want to remember in sequence.

title: Chunking
description: Break down long information into manageable chunks. Especially useful for numbers or lists.

title: Number Shapes
description: Associate numbers with shapes they resemble to create vivid visual anchors.

title: Peg System
description: Use a pre-memorized list of 'pegs' (like rhyming words or shapes) to hang new information onto.

title: Major System
description: Translate numbers into consonant sounds and form memorable words or images.

title: Visualization
description: Create clear and exaggerated mental images to represent information. Use senses and movement.

title: Method of Loci
description: Similar to the Memory Palace, this ancient technique maps items onto real-world paths.

title: Link Method
description: Form a chain where each item is connected to the next with a strong visual or conceptual link.

title: Coming Soon
description: New techniques and examples will be added to expand your memory toolkit.
